description: Try our easy to follow Roast Pumpkin, Feta, Walnut & Rocket Pizzas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable pizza,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Pumpkin,Low sugar
name: Roast Pumpkin, Feta, Walnut & Rocket Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg pumpkin, deseeded, peeled and cut into 3cm cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line 3 baking trays with baking paper.
Combine 3/4 cup warm water, yeast, salt and sugar in a jug. Stir and stand for 5 minutes until bubbles appear.

Sift flour into a large bowl. Add yeast mixture and oil. Mix to form a soft dough. Knead on a lightly floured surface for 5 minutes until dough bounces back when lightly pressed. Place into an oiled bowl. Cover and stand in a warm place for 30 minutes until doubled in size.
Meanwhile, place pumpkin onto a prepared tray, spray with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Bake on top shelf of oven for 15-20 minutes or until tender.

Punch dough down and divide in half. Roll out each to a 24cm round. Place onto trays. Spread with pesto and top with cooked pumpkin, walnuts and feta. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until crust is golden and crisp. Top with rocket and serve.
